findings.title: Owner Privilege: Extending Early Withdrawal Fee
findings.description: The owner can extend the early withdrawal fee for a long time by calling setPoolLockedTimeAndFee every 30 days with a withdrawal fee of 10 percent.

findings.title: Owner can change the start block
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the start block, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change the reward per block
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the reward per block, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Lock Percent Modification
findings.description: The owner has the ability to change the lock percent up to 99 percent.

findings.title: Owner can change the reward halving rate
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the reward halving rate, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change the commission percentage
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the commission percentage at will.
